meanings.sent1: I need to decoke the engine to keep it running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Mechanics often decoke engines to improve performance.
meanings.sent3: After I decoke the engine, it will feel like new again.
meanings.sent4: Decoking the engine is like giving it a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to decoke regularly for optimal engine health.

meanings.definition: The act of removing carbon deposits from (an engine)
meanings.sent1: The decoke of the engine was necessary to prevent damage.
meanings.sent2: A thorough decoke can extend the life of the engine.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic's decoke of the engine was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The decoke revealed a cleaner engine underneath.
meanings.sent5: Regular decoke maintenance is crucial for engine longevity.
